Présent (Present).Je couche: I put to bed / I sleep
Présent (Present).Tu couches: You put to bed / You sleep
Présent (Present).Il/Elle couche: He/She puts to bed / He/She sleeps
Présent (Present).Nous couchons: We put to bed / We sleep
Présent (Present).Vous couchez: You put to bed / You sleep (formal)
Présent (Present).Ils/Elles couchent: They put to bed / They sleep

Imparfait (Imperfect).Je couchais: I used to put to bed / I used to sleep
Imparfait (Imperfect).Tu couchais: You used to put to bed / You used to sleep
Imparfait (Imperfect).Il/Elle couchait: He/She used to put to bed / He/She used to sleep
Imparfait (Imperfect).Nous couchions: We used to put to bed / We used to sleep
Imparfait (Imperfect).Vous couchiez: You used to put to bed / You used to sleep (formal)
Imparfait (Imperfect).Ils/Elles couchaient: They used to put to bed / They used to sleep

Passé composé (Present Perfect).J'ai couché: I have put to bed / I have slept
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Tu as couché: You have put to bed / You have slept
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Il/Elle a couché: He/She has put to bed / He/She has slept
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Nous avons couché: We have put to bed / We have slept
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Vous avez couché: You have put to bed / You have slept (formal)
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Ils/Elles ont couché: They have put to bed / They have slept

Futur simple (Simple Future).Je coucherai: I will put to bed / I will sleep
Futur simple (Simple Future).Tu coucheras: You will put to bed / You will sleep
Futur simple (Simple Future).Il/Elle couchera: He/She will put to bed / He/She will sleep
Futur simple (Simple Future).Nous coucherons: We will put to bed / We will sleep
Futur simple (Simple Future).Vous coucherez: You will put to bed / You will sleep (formal)
Futur simple (Simple Future).Ils/Elles coucheront: They will put to bed / They will sleep
